channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Critical New Google Email Warning As Password Attacks Surge
item.description: Google email attacks confirmed — don’t ignore this critical warning.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Thursday, December 25
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: The K-shaped economy is carrying a ticking time bomb into 2026
item.description: "I've never seen anything like it," KPMG's chief economist Diane Swonk told Fortune.

item.title: How investment giant Vanguard’s CIO is placing big tech bets today to create the AI digital advisor of tomorrow
item.description: Vanguard CIO Nitin Tandon says AI can be used to hyper-personalize guidance for customers.

item.title: CEO of a $134 billion software giant blasts companies with billions in funding but zero revenue: ‘That’s clearly a bubble, right… it’s, like, insane’

item.title: American Jews, Chinese food and Christmas: The first connection was a 1935 gift of chow mein to a New Jersey orphanage
item.description: Elena Kagan was asked where she was on Christmas during her Supreme Court confirmation: “Like all Jews, I was probably at a Chinese restaurant.”

item.title: Samsung Unveils New Odyssey Gaming Monitor Range—Including World’s First 6K Glasses-Free 3D Model
item.description: Five-strong set of new Odyssey monitors also includes the world’s first 1,040Hz monitor.

item.title: The Powerball prize now stands at $1.7 billion. Here are the biggest jackpots in history—and where the winning tickets were sold
item.description: The U.S. has seen more than a dozen lottery jackpot prizes exceed $1 billion since 2016.

item.title: FBI Disrupts $14.6 Million Stolen Password Operation
item.description: The FBI disrupted a massive stolen-password operation, the DOJ confirmed, that defrauded U.S. citizens out of millions.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
